import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export default function Signup() { const[name,setName]=useState(); const[mob,setMob]=useState(); const[dept,setDept]=useState(); const[email,setEmail]=useState(); const[pass,setPass]=useState(); return ( <>

setName(e.target.value)}/>

setPass(e.target.value)}/>
